content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- generator="Joomla! - Open Source Content Management" --> <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"  xml:lang="en-gb">  <title type="text">Home</title>  <subtitle type="text">52\ufffd\ufffdNorth Initiative for Geospatial Open Source Software GmbH</subtitle>  <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org"/>  <id>http://52north.org/</id>  <updated>2015-03-18T09:12:48+00:00</updated>  <author>   <name>52\ufffd\ufffdNorth Initiative for Geospatial Open Source Software GmbH</name>   <email>it-support@52north.org</email>  </author>  <generator uri="http://joomla.org">Joomla! - Open Source Content Management</generator>  <link rel="self" type="application/atom+xml" href="http://52north.org/?format=feed&type=atom"/>  <entry>   <title>52\ufffd\ufffdNorth is Google Summer of Code 2015 Mentoring Organization</title>   <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org/394-52-north-is-google-summer-of-code-2015-mentoring-organization"/>   <published>2015-03-03T09:45:34+00:00</published>   <updated>2015-03-03T09:45:34+00:00</updated>   <id>http://52north.org/394-52-north-is-google-summer-of-code-2015-mentoring-organization</id>   <author>    <name>Ann Hitchcock</name>    <email>a.hitchcock@52north.org</email>   </author>   <summary type="html"><p><sup><em>2015-03-03</em></sup></p> <p>&nbsp;<img src="http://52north.org/images/stories/52nadmin/logos/GoogleSummer_2015logo_horizontal.jpg" alt="GoogleSummer 2015logo horizontal" width="147" height="61" /></p> <p>52\ufffd\ufffdNorth is thrilled to have been chosen from a pool of 416 applications to be one of 137 open source projects to participate as a mentoring organization in the Google Summer of Code 2015! The Google Summer of Code (<a href="http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2015">GSoC</a>) is a global program that offers students stipends to write code for Open Source projects.This year's stipend recipients receive $ 5.500 for 3 months of successful software development.</p> </summary>   <content type="html"><p><sup><em>2015-03-03</em></sup></p> <p>&nbsp;<img src="images/stories/52nadmin/logos/GoogleSummer_2015logo_horizontal.jpg" alt="GoogleSummer 2015logo horizontal" width="147" height="61" /></p> <p>52\ufffd\ufffdNorth is thrilled to have been chosen from a pool of 416 applications to be one of 137 open source projects to participate as a mentoring organization in the Google Summer of Code 2015! The Google Summer of Code (<a href="http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2015">GSoC</a>) is a global program that offers students stipends to write code for Open Source projects.This year's stipend recipients receive $ 5.500 for 3 months of successful software development.</p> </content>   <category term="News" />  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Updated URLs</title>   <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org/392-updated-urls"/>   <published>2015-02-23T13:45:56+00:00</published>   <updated>2015-02-23T13:45:56+00:00</updated>   <id>http://52north.org/392-updated-urls</id>   <author>    <name>Eike Hinderk Juerrens</name>    <email>e.h.juerrens@52north.org</email>   </author>   <summary type="html"><p><img style="vertical-align: bottom; float: right;" src="http://52north.org/images/stories/52nadmin/others/52n-toolbox.png" alt="52n toolbox" width="64" height="64" /><sup><em>2015-02-23</em></sup></p> <p>The 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth IT Team has recently updated the CMS behind 52north.org. We have done our best to keep things in place but as always, not everything could stay where it was and some inhabitants of our page were relocated.</p> </summary>   <content type="html"><p><img style="vertical-align: bottom; float: right;" src="images/stories/52nadmin/others/52n-toolbox.png" alt="52n toolbox" width="64" height="64" /><sup><em>2015-02-23</em></sup></p> <p>The 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth IT Team has recently updated the CMS behind 52north.org. We have done our best to keep things in place but as always, not everything could stay where it was and some inhabitants of our page were relocated.</p> </content>   <category term="News" />  </entry>  <entry>   <title>52\ufffd\ufffdNorth Workshops @ FOSSGIS 2015</title>   <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org/388-52-north-workshops-fossgis-2015"/>   <published>2015-01-23T10:25:47+00:00</published>   <updated>2015-01-23T10:25:47+00:00</updated>   <id>http://52north.org/388-52-north-workshops-fossgis-2015</id>   <author>    <name>Ann Hitchcock</name>    <email>a.hitchcock@52north.org</email>   </author>   <summary type="html"><p><sup><em>2015-01-23</em></sup></p> <p><em>How can sensor web technology be used to provide, as well as, collect measured data?<img style="float: right;" src="http://52north.org/images/stories/52nadmin/logos/600px-Fossgis15-logo_ohne-Rand.png" alt="600px Fossgis15 logo ohne Rand" width="48" height="48" />&nbsp;&nbsp; <br />&nbsp;&nbsp; What exactly is SWE?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</em><br /><em>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; How can I use the 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth WPS to create, provide and use processes?</em></p> <p>These and other questions will be answered during 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds hands-on workshops:</p> <ul> <li>"Introduction to the Sensor Web" and</li> <li>"The 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth WPS".</li> </ul> <p><a href="http://www.fossgis.de/konferenz/2015/anmeldung/">Register now! </a></p> </summary>   <content type="html"><p><sup><em>2015-01-23</em></sup></p> <p><em>How can sensor web technology be used to provide, as well as, collect measured data?<img style="float: right;" src="images/stories/52nadmin/logos/600px-Fossgis15-logo_ohne-Rand.png" alt="600px Fossgis15 logo ohne Rand" width="48" height="48" />&nbsp;&nbsp; <br />&nbsp;&nbsp; What exactly is SWE?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</em><br /><em>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; How can I use the 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth WPS to create, provide and use processes?</em></p> <p>These and other questions will be answered during 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds hands-on workshops:</p> <ul> <li>"Introduction to the Sensor Web" and</li> <li>"The 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth WPS".</li> </ul> <p><a href="http://www.fossgis.de/konferenz/2015/anmeldung/">Register now! </a></p> </content>   <category term="News" />  </entry>  <entry>   <title>OWS 11 kick-off</title>   <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org/387-ows-11-kick-off"/>   <published>2015-01-19T08:58:42+00:00</published>   <updated>2015-01-19T08:58:42+00:00</updated>   <id>http://52north.org/387-ows-11-kick-off</id>   <author>    <name>Ann Hitchcock</name>    <email>a.hitchcock@52north.org</email>   </author>   <summary type="html"><p><em><sub>2015-01-19</sub></em></p> <p>The OGC Web Services Phase 11 (OWS 11) kicked off&nbsp;at the George Mason University in Fairfax, Virginia last week. Testbed 11 focuses on spatial communication requirements that emerge when a population is displaced due to coastal inundation. 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth contributes its expertise to two testbed threads: Cross-Community Interoperability (CCI) and Urban-Climate Resilience (UCR).</p> </summary>   <content type="html"><p><em><sub>2015-01-19</sub></em></p> <p>The OGC Web Services Phase 11 (OWS 11) kicked off&nbsp;at the George Mason University in Fairfax, Virginia last week. Testbed 11 focuses on spatial communication requirements that emerge when a population is displaced due to coastal inundation. 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth contributes its expertise to two testbed threads: Cross-Community Interoperability (CCI) and Urban-Climate Resilience (UCR).</p> </content>   <category term="News" />  </entry>  <entry>   <title>52\ufffd\ufffdNorth SES 1.2.2 is available</title>   <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org/382-52-north-ses-1-2-2-is-available"/>   <published>2015-01-09T07:52:26+00:00</published>   <updated>2015-01-09T07:52:26+00:00</updated>   <id>http://52north.org/382-52-north-ses-1-2-2-is-available</id>   <author>    <name>Ann Hitchcock</name>    <email>a.hitchcock@52north.org</email>   </author>   <summary type="html"><p><sup><em>2015-01-09</em></sup><br />The new 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth Sensor Event Service (SES) release includes several minor bug fixes and the following new features:</p> <ul> <li>Stream persistency allows consistent states of events streams between service restarts</li> <li>Initial pattern matching for overshoot and undershoot style subscriptions</li> </ul> </summary>   <content type="html"><p><sup><em>2015-01-09</em></sup><br />The new 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth Sensor Event Service (SES) release includes several minor bug fixes and the following new features:</p> <ul> <li>Stream persistency allows consistent states of events streams between service restarts</li> <li>Initial pattern matching for overshoot and undershoot style subscriptions</li> </ul> </content>   <category term="News" />  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Happy Holidays !</title>   <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org/381-happyholidays2014"/>   <published>2014-12-17T08:16:13+00:00</published>   <updated>2014-12-17T08:16:13+00:00</updated>   <id>http://52north.org/381-happyholidays2014</id>   <author>    <name>Ann Hitchcock</name>    <email>a.hitchcock@52north.org</email>   </author>   <summary type="html"><p><sup><em>2014-12-19</em></sup></p> <p><img src="http://52north.org/images/stories/52nadmin/logos/happyholidays.png" alt="happyholidays" height="32" width="157" />to all 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth software users, contributors, partners and customers! 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth would like to thank you for the successful collaboration in 2014. </p> <p>As in the past, 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth donates to a good cause instead of sending christmas cards. This year our donation will support epilepsy research at the Neurology Department of the University Medical Center Essen Foundation (<a href="http://www.universitaetsmedizin.de/index.php">Stiftung Universit\ufffd\ufffdtsmedizin Essen</a>).</p> </summary>   <content type="html"><p><sup><em>2014-12-19</em></sup></p> <p><img src="images/stories/52nadmin/logos/happyholidays.png" alt="happyholidays" height="32" width="157" />to all 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth software users, contributors, partners and customers! 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth would like to thank you for the successful collaboration in 2014. </p> <p>As in the past, 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth donates to a good cause instead of sending christmas cards. This year our donation will support epilepsy research at the Neurology Department of the University Medical Center Essen Foundation (<a href="http://www.universitaetsmedizin.de/index.php">Stiftung Universit\ufffd\ufffdtsmedizin Essen</a>).</p> </content>   <category term="News" />  </entry>  <entry>   <title>2nd Sensor Web Workshop draws an international, interdisciplinary crowd</title>   <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org/380-2nd-sensor-web-workshop-draws-an-international-interdisciplinary-crowd"/>   <published>2014-12-11T10:33:04+00:00</published>   <updated>2014-12-11T10:33:04+00:00</updated>   <id>http://52north.org/380-2nd-sensor-web-workshop-draws-an-international-interdisciplinary-crowd</id>   <author>    <name>Ann Hitchcock</name>    <email>a.hitchcock@52north.org</email>   </author>   <summary type="html"><p><sup><em>2014-12-11</em></sup></p> <p><img title="Sensor Web Workshop 2014" src="http://52north.org/images/stories/52nadmin/pics/swe_worskhop_14/sweworkshop_sj.JPG" alt="Sensor Web Workshop 2014" width="300" height="200" /> <img title="coffee break" src="http://52north.org/images/stories/52nadmin/pics/swe_worskhop_14/coffebreak.JPG" alt="coffee break" width="300" height="200" /></p> <p>52\ufffd\ufffdNorth recently held its annual Sensor Web Workshop at the University of M\ufffd\ufffdnster's <a href="http://www.uni-muenster.de/Geoinformatics/en/" target="_blank">Insitute for Geoinformatics</a>. Sensor Web enthusiasts and practitioners met with experts at 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Sensor Web Workshop to share their experience with Sensor Web activities and identify next research and development steps.</p> </summary>   <content type="html"><p><sup><em>2014-12-11</em></sup></p> <p><img title="Sensor Web Workshop 2014" src="images/stories/52nadmin/pics/swe_worskhop_14/sweworkshop_sj.JPG" alt="Sensor Web Workshop 2014" width="300" height="200" /> <img title="coffee break" src="images/stories/52nadmin/pics/swe_worskhop_14/coffebreak.JPG" alt="coffee break" width="300" height="200" /></p> <p>52\ufffd\ufffdNorth recently held its annual Sensor Web Workshop at the University of M\ufffd\ufffdnster's <a href="http://www.uni-muenster.de/Geoinformatics/en/" target="_blank">Insitute for Geoinformatics</a>. Sensor Web enthusiasts and practitioners met with experts at 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Sensor Web Workshop to share their experience with Sensor Web activities and identify next research and development steps.</p> </content>   <category term="News" />  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Smooth operator - the 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth WPS 3.3.1 is available</title>   <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org/379-smooth-operator-the-52-north-wps-3-3-1-is-available"/>   <published>2014-12-09T08:37:56+00:00</published>   <updated>2014-12-09T08:37:56+00:00</updated>   <id>http://52north.org/379-smooth-operator-the-52-north-wps-3-3-1-is-available</id>   <author>    <name>Ann Hitchcock</name>    <email>a.hitchcock@52north.org</email>   </author>   <summary type="html"><p><sup><em>2012-12-09</em></sup></p> <p>The new 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth WPS release features additional configuration parameters, which enable more fine tuning. In addition, the client API and GRASS 7 backend now run more smoothly.</p> </summary>   <content type="html"><p><sup><em>2012-12-09</em></sup></p> <p>The new 52\ufffd\ufffdNorth WPS release features additional configuration parameters, which enable more fine tuning. In addition, the client API and GRASS 7 backend now run more smoothly.</p> </content>   <category term="News" />  </entry>  <entry>   <title>App for FOSSGIS 2015</title>   <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://52north.org/377-app-for-fossgis-2015"/>   <published>2014-11-17T08:23:57+00:00</published>   <updated>2014-11-17T08:23:57+00:00</updated>   <id>http://52north.org/377-app-for-fossgis-2015</id>   <author>    <name>Ann Hitchcock</name>    <email>a.hitchcock@52north.org</email>   </author>   <summary type="html"><p><sup><em>2014-11-17</em></sup></p> <p>Calling all ifgi students - join a study project to develop an Android app to guide <a href="http://www.fossgis.de/konferenz/2015/">FOSSGIS 2015</a> attendees through the conference.</p> <p>The <a href="http://www.uni-muenster.de/Geoinformatics/">Institute for Geoinformatics</a> offers a study project <a href="http://www.uni-muenster.de/iDisplays/rssEntry.php?id=2737">"Developing an app supporting conference participants"</a>. Students can register develop an app to help FOSSGIS 2015 attendees navigate - spatially, temporally and socially - through the conference.</p> </summary>   <content type="html"><p><sup><em>2014-11-17</em></sup></p> <p>Calling all ifgi students - join a study project to develop an Android app to guide <a href="http://www.fossgis.de/konferenz/2015/">FOSSGIS 2015</a> attendees through the conference.</p> <p>The <a href="http://www.uni-muenster.de/Geoinformatics/">Institute for Geoinformatics</a> offers a study project <a href="http://www.uni-muenster.de/iDisplays/rssEntry.php?id=2737">"Developing an app supporting conference participants"</a>. Students can register develop an app to help FOSSGIS 2015 attendees navigate - spatially, temporally and socially - through the conference.</p> </content>   <category term="News" />  </entry> </feed>
